item.title: [40k] Kill! Maim! Burn!
item.description:
Instant

Choose one or more —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target creature.

• Kill! Maim! Burn! deals 3 damage to target player.

https://twitter.com/PhunkRoyaI/status/1570054864977252352

item.title: [40k] Icon of Ancestry
item.description:
Artifact

As Icon of Ancestry enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

{3}, {T}: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card of the chosen type from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Inspiring Call
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] New Horizons
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

item.title: [40k] Opal Palace
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Trygon Prime
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Subterranean Assault — Whenever Trygon Prime attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it and a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target attacking creature. That creature can't be blocked this turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Purestrain Genestealer
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Purestrain Genestealer enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

Vanguard Species — Whenever Purestrain Genestealer attacks, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from it. If you do, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Hierophant Bio-Titan
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Frenzied Metabolism — As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each counter removed this way.

Vigilance, reach, ward {2}

Titanic — Hierophant Bio-Titan can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Ravener
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Flash

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Whenever Ravener enters the battlefield, target creature attacks target opponent this turn if able.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Mawloc
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Terror from the Deep — When Mawloc enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature an opponent controls. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Malanthrope
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Flying

Scavenge the Dead — When Malanthrope enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard. Put a +1/+1 counter on Malanthrope fro each creature card exiled this way.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Gargoyle Flock
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid Gargoyle

Flying

Skyswarm — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create a 1/1 blue Tyranid Gargoyle creature token with flying.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Tervigon
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Trample

Spawn Termagant — Whenever Tervigon deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Tyranid creature tokens.

item.title: [40k] Termagant Swarm
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Death Frenzy — When Termagant Swarm dies, create a number of 1/1 green Tyranid creature tokens equal to Termagant Swarm's power.

item.title: [40k] Sporocyst
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Defender

Spore Chimney — When Sporocyst enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [40k] Lictor
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Flash

Pheromone Trail — When Lictor enters the battlefield, if a creature entered the battlefield under an opponent's control this turn, create a 3/3 green Tyranid Warrior creature token with trample.

item.title: [40k] The Red Terror
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Tyranid

Advanced Species — Whenever a red source you control deals damage to one or more permanents and/or players, put a +1/+1 counter on The Red Terror.

item.title: [40k] Haruspex
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Rapacious Hunger — Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Haruspex.

Devouring Monster — {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Haruspex: Add X mana of any one color.

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: [40k] Hull Breach
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

item.title: [40k] Herald's Horn
item.description:
Artifact

As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.

At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

item.title: [40k] Harrow
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [40k] Game Trail
item.description:
Land

As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

item.title: [40k] Frontier Bivouac
item.description:
Land

Frontier Bivouac enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R}.

item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Sorcery

item.title: [40k] Exotic Orchard
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [40k] Death's Presence
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the power of the creature that died.

item.title: [40k] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [40k] Cinder Glade
item.description:
Land — Mountain Forest

({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)

Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.title: [40k] Cave of Temptation
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Cave of Temptation: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [40k] Bred for the Hunt
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

item.title: [40k] Aetherize
item.description:
Instant

Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
